titleStmt.title: The copy of a letter sent by one of the camp, of the Prince of Conde (touching the feats of war as of late haue been doon) to a freend of his, the xxx. of December last past. Anno Domini. 1568
titleStmt.author: One of the camp, of the Prince of Conde.

publicationStmt.publisher: At the long shop adioyning vnto S. Mildreds Churche in the Pultrie, by John Allde,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: the long shop adioyning vnto S. Mildreds Churche in the Pultrie
